OPENAPI_JSON_DOCS_URL.description: URL to the OpenAPI specification JSON (defaults to https://api.staging.readymojo.com/openapi.json)
OPENAPI_JSON_DOCS_URL.title: OPENAPI_JSON_DOCS_URL

API_REQUEST_BASE_URL.description: Optional base URL to override the default URL extracted from the OpenAPI document.
API_REQUEST_BASE_URL.title: API_REQUEST_BASE_URL

MCP_API_PREFIX.description: Customizable tool namespace (default 'any_openapi'). Allows for control over tool naming.
MCP_API_PREFIX.title: MCP_API_PREFIX
